1.details: Request Supabase authentication credentials from user and configure the backend database, authentication, storage, and payment processing infrastructure.

2.content: Build the core full-stack directory application
2.details: Develop the complete React + Supabase web application including: 1) React frontend with responsive design (Navy Blue #003366, British Racing Green #004225, Gold #FFD700) 2) Complete Supabase backend with database tables 3) User authentication system 4) Advanced search and filtering system 5) Consultant profile pages with all specified elements 6) Three-tier membership system (Free/Professional £99/month/Premium £299/month) 7) Stripe payment integration for subscriptions 8) Lead generation and quote request system 9) Review and rating functionality 10) Admin dashboard for revenue tracking

3.content: Create comprehensive content and SEO optimization
3.details: Generate all required content including: 1) 10 blog posts (500-1000 words each) on Brexit compliance topics 2) Static pages (About, How It Works, Pricing, etc.) 3) Dynamic landing page templates for cities, services, industries 4) Brexit Compliance Guide (5000 words) 5) SEO meta descriptions and schema markup 6) XML sitemap generation

4.details: Deploy the complete application with all features working including payment processing, user registration, directory functionality, and content management. Ensure fast loading (under 3 seconds), mobile optimization, and all technical requirements are met.
